lead_paragraph: Thomas Pieters gave Darren Clarke a close-up view of his talent when he shot a 62 playing alongside Europe's Ryder Cup captain in Denmark last week.

headline.print_headline: Pieters' Power Play Won Ryder Cup Call-Up, Says Clarke
headline.main: Pieters' Power Play Won Ryder Cup Call-Up, Says Clarke
